protein.specific_function: Golgi auto-antigen; probably involved in maintaining cis-Golgi structure

reference.reference_text: Fritzler MJ, Hamel JC, Ochs RL, Chan EK: Molecular characterization of two human autoantigens: unique cDNAs encoding 95- and 160-kD proteins of a putative family in the Golgi complex. J Exp Med. 1993 Jul 1;178(1):49-62.
